--- In gladiator@y..., bluedrgnkid@a... wrote:
> Wow. Could you imagine the awesome power of a Soldier/Archmage? And 
if you 
> could fuse hybrids and normals, a Soldier/Archmage/Cleric?

No, hybrids shouldn't fuse with normals (think about how 
combinations).

In case, it wasn't clear, hybrids would still have a maximum of 4 
attacks (with alternates) to keep them in line.  It would ridiculous 
to merge 3-4 characters together because of all the attacks lost.
